Detailed Description

A class to help facilitate searching through folders...

This class provides the basic functionality for searching through folders and creating assets. The default behavior when a file is found can be changed by subclassing and reimplementing handleFile()

the file filter used by this search folder.
void DzSearchFolder::handleFile ( DzDBContentFoldersTable *  folder,
const QString &  filename,
DzSearchThreadHelper *  helper 
) const [protected, virtual]

This method determines what is done when a file is found. The default behavior creates a new asset with a default icon, sets the filename and url and adds it to the helper

Parameters:
filename The name of the file
folder The content folder of the file.
helper The search helper being used during the search
void DzSearchFolder::handleFiles ( const QStringList &  fileList,
DzDBContentFoldersTable *  folder,
DzSearchThreadHelper *  helper 
) const [protected, virtual]

This method determines what actions are taken on the list of files. The default implementation just loops over them and calls handleFile.

Parameters:
fileList The list of files matching filter for the handed in folder
folder The content folders of the file.
helper The search helper being used during the search

Searches this folder with the given thread helper
